au.edu.rmit.tzar.resultscopier

Class FileResultsCopier

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.tzar.resultscopier.FileResultsCopier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResultsCopier

    public class FileResultsCopier
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResultsCopier
    Copies results using the local file system (including mounted remote drives).

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileResultsCopier

        public FileResultsCopier(java.io.File baseDestPath)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        baseDestPath - the path for the results to be copied to. This directory will be created if it does not exist.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the base destination path already exists and is not a directory or does not exist and cannot be created

    • Method Detail

      • copyResults

        public void copyResults(Run run,
               java.io.File sourcePath,
               boolean success)
                 throws TzarException
        Description copied from interface: ResultsCopier
        Copies the sourcePath directory to the destination path for this copier. The destination path may be on another server, copied by a protocol specific to the implementation of this interface. Implementations should update outputHost and outputPath on the run after copying.
        Specified by:
        copyResults in interface ResultsCopier
        Parameters:
        run - the run containing the results to be copied
        sourcePath - the path containing the run results
        success - true if the run was successful
        Throws:
        TzarException - if the files could not be copied

        Description copied from interface: ResultsCopier
        Gets the base destination path for this copier.

        getBaseDestPath in interface ResultsCopier
